name: Alzheimer 3: The Philologist
description:
Alzheimer 3: The Philologist

Any language is a foreign-language-patchwork,
and Alzh is forgetting where words come from. 
Will you help him in this UI-based game?

At his 80's, Alzh is loosing his memory.
Yeah, I know what you are thinking,
he didn't eat too many raisins as a child.
You should, fearless child!

Anyway... he was once a well known philologist.
But nowadays, he doesn't remember where
words come from.

Exactly, that's why you came from far,
far away my young padawan.
You are here to help Alzh remember
all those tricky words.

You will have to answer 10 easy questions.
For each question,
you will have 10 seconds to choose
1 of the 4 displayed choices.

Don't be disguided,
just one answer is the correct one,
even though you might think that
two or none are correct.

You just have to use your mouse (and your brain!).

[This game is part of a learning process]
